amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Mississippi River and Tributaries program by $18 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 24 printed in the Congressional Record to reduced funds for the Mississippi River and Tributaries by $18 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Westmoreland amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 111 - 315 (Roll no. 504).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Westmoreland.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
